Convenient that the title won't say the actual number, which is 2019 assaults. Considering there live 6.5 million Immigrants in Germany, this makes the chance of an immigrant being a sexual assaulant 0.0003%. The chance of an Brit being a sexual assaultant is 3x times higher, at 0.001%. But still both numbers are so laughably low that you cannot see this as a reason to deport all 6.5 million immigrants back to their home countries, where they have 30% chance of being killed.
